name: vroom vroom game
description:
This is a very early prototype of a racing game I'm working on for fun...

I'm not sure if this project will go somewhere but I like tinkering with it!

Inputs :

InputKeyboardGamepadForward W (or Z for Azerty) Up ArrowRight TriggerBackwardSDown ArrowLeft TriggerTurn LeftA (or Q for Azerty)Left ArrowLeft StickTurn RightDRight ArrowLeft StickBrakeShiftWest ButtonDriftSpaceSouth Button

-> Made on Unity, the car model and the race track are just assets I found on the Asset Store (Car ; Race Track) and the music was made by a friend just for this project ;)

/!\ Game is not optimized (so don't be surprised if the files are heavy)
